QuestData.Title: An Audience With The Archmage
QuestData.Description: I'm pleased to report that your Arcane Sanctum is up and running, commander!$B$BEverything is exactly as the blueprint says... except for this note Baros scrawled on the bottom. "Don't forget to connect the sanctum to the ley line network!"$B$BCommander, I'm a foreman, not a mage. I... have absolutely no idea how to do that.$B$BWe've found Archmage Khadgar and some other Kirin Tor not far from here. To the east, near the mountains. Perhaps we should ask them for a hand?
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Archmage Khadgar in Talador.
